title: Infinite Evolution - Novel Updates
tags: Male Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role
author: Biting A Dog   咬狗
description:
This is hell, where you have great power and great wealth, and where you are still a cloud, everyone is equal before death.

This is heaven, any earth you want and can’t get, here can help you to achieve, as long as you can through the defense of death, through the death rate as high as 99% of the “game”.

Courage, wisdom, means, paranoia,

Only in the baptism of war and fresh blood can people understand what is real-strength.>
